Alert Name: bush
Bears look to maul Wall Street
Stock futures fall in early trading, after another jump in Treasury rates and overseas market declines.
06/08/07 06:29 AM, EDT
Another jump in bond yields and an a fall in overseas markets could extend Wall Street's sell-off that has already taken more than 400 points off the Dow Jones industrial average in the last three days.
FULL STORY
